Rank.Description: Increases your Critical Hit chance by 1%.
Increases your Critical Hit chance by 2%.
Increases your Critical Hit chance by 3%.
Increases your Critical Hit chance by 4%.
Increases your Critical Hit chance by 5%.
Increases the damage of your Final Blow by 5% and Critical Hit chance by 3%.
Increases the damage of your Final Blow by 10% and Critical Hit chance by 6%.
Increases the damage of your Final Blow by 15% and Critical Hit chance by 9%.
Increases the damage of your Savage Strike by 5% and Critical Hit chance by 5%.
Increases the damage of your Savage Strike by 10% and Critical Hit chance by 10%.
Your melee weapon abilities have a 50% chance to cause the target to bleed for 20% of your weapon's damage over 6 seconds. Can be applied up to 3 times.
Your melee weapon abilities have a 50% chance to cause the target to bleed for 40% of your weapon's damage over 6 seconds. Can be applied up to 3 times.
Your melee weapon abilities have a 50% chance to cause the target to bleed for 60% of your weapon's damage over 6 seconds. Can be applied up to 3 times.

Ability.Description: Deals 365 to 403 damage. Ignores Armor. Bleeds 1466 health over 10s. Awards 1 Combo Point.

Rank.Description: Increases your Physical damage by 2%.
Increases your Physical damage by 4%.
Increases your Physical damage by 6%.
Increases your Physical damage by 8%.
Increases your Physical damage by 10%.
Your Critical Hit attacks increase your damage by 2% for 10 seconds.
Your Critical Hit attacks increase your damage by 4% for 10 seconds.
Your Critical Hit attacks increase your damage by 6% for 10 seconds.
Your Critical Hit attacks increase your damage by 8% for 10 seconds.
Your Critical Hit attacks increase your damage by 10% for 10 seconds.
Increases the difficulty of detecting you while stealthing by 30% and increases your movement speed while stealthing by 30%.
Your Critical Hit attacks debuff the target, increasing damage taken from you by 1% for 10 seconds.
Your Critical Hit attacks debuff the target, increasing damage taken from you by 2% for 10 seconds.
Your Critical Hit attacks debuff the target, increasing damage taken from you by 3% for 10 seconds.
Your Critical Hit attacks debuff the target, increasing damage taken from you by 4% for 10 seconds.
Your Critical Hit attacks debuff the target, increasing damage taken from you by 5% for 10 seconds.

Increases the damage of Assassin attacks by 15%. Increases Attack Power and Weapon Damage by 15%.

Ability.Description: Deals 1941 to 2145 damage. Deals 25% less damage when not behind the target. Awards 1 Combo Point.

Rank.Description: Increases the damage your Poison abilities deal by 5%.
Increases the damage your Poison abilities deal by 10%.
Increases the damage your Poison abilities deal by 15%.
Increases the damage of your From Stealth attacks by 10%. They also have a 50% chance of gaining an additional Combo Point.
Increases the damage of your From Stealth attacks by 20%. They also have a 100% chance of gaining an additional Combo Point.
Your Stealth now lasts until cancelled.
Increases the Weapon damage and Attack Power bonus of your Poison-coated weapons by 2% and the chance to apply Poison to your enemy by 10%.
Increases the Weapon damage and Attack Power bonus of your Poison-coated weapons by 4% and the chance to apply Poison to your enemy by 20%.
Increases the Weapon damage and Attack Power bonus of your Poison-coated weapons by 6% and the chance to apply Poison to your enemy by 30%.
Increases the Weapon damage and Attack Power bonus of your Poison-coated weapons by 8% and the chance to apply Poison to your enemy by 40%.
Increases the Weapon damage and Attack Power bonus of your Poison-coated weapons by 10% and the chance to apply Poison to your enemy by 50%.
Increases damage of all your damage over time effects by 10%. Your Impale causes targets to take an additional 10% damage from your Final Blow.
Increases damage of all your damage over time effects by 20%. Your Impale causes targets to take an additional 20% damage from your Final Blow.
Increases the Critical Hit chance of Backstab by 5%. Increases the Critical Hit chance of your From Stealth attacks by 25%. Decreases penalty on Backstab by 10%.
Increases the Critical Hit chance of Backstab by 10%. Increases the Critical Hit chance of your From Stealth attacks by 50%. Decreases penalty on Backstab by 20%.

Ability.Description: Applies Stealth and removes movement impairing effects. Prevents damage from breaking Stealth for 3s.

Rank.Description: After using any From Stealth attack, you deal 5% more damage and take 5% less damage for 15 seconds.
After using any From Stealth attack, you deal 10% more damage and take 10% less damage for 15 seconds.
After using any From Stealth attack, you deal 15% more damage and take 15% less damage for 15 seconds.
Your Assassin Finishers have a 20% chance per Combo Point to apply Expose Weakness to the enemy.
